sense.gloss: to shoulder, to carry on one's shoulder
to nominate for a position, to choose as a representative
to take (someone) for a ride, to deceive, to take in
to be caught up in superstition

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑家族↑↓かぞく↓↑全員↑↓ぜんいん↓に↑見送↑↓みおく↓られながら、↑旅↑↓たび↓↑支度↑↓じたく↓を↑整↑↓ととの↓えたザックを|↑担↑↓かつ↓ぐ|。
sdata.e: Being seen off by my whole family I shouldered a rucksack, stocked with my trip supplies.
